tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE GeneSequences (
    gene_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    gene_name VARCHAR(100),
    sequence TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE SequenceAnalysis (
    analysis_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    gene_id INT,
    analysis_result TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (gene_id) REFERENCES GeneSequences(gene_id)
)

CREATE TABLE ComparisonResults (
    comparison_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    analysis_id INT,
    comparison_result TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (analysis_id) REFERENCES SequenceAnalysis(analysis_id)
)

CREATE TABLE comparisons (
    comparison_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sequence_id_a INT,
    sequence_id_b INT,
    similarity_score FLOAT,
    FOREIGN KEY (sequence_id_a) REFERENCES sequences(sequence_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (sequence_id_b) REFERENCES sequences(sequence_id)
);

CREATE TABLE logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    action_description TEXT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id)
);
